array.string: LOG="/var/log/macscope-vhid.log" echo "[startup] Waiting for Karabiner VirtualHID driver..." >> "$LOG" for i in {1..15}; do if systemextensionsctl list | grep -q "Karabiner-DriverKit-VirtualHIDDevice.*activated.*enabled"; then if pgrep -x "Karabiner-VirtualHIDDevice-Daemon" >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo "[ok] Karabiner VirtualHID ready after $i attempts" >> "$LOG" break fi fi echo "[wait] Attempt $i - driver not ready" >> "$LOG" sleep 2 done mkdir -p /var/run/macscope chmod 777 /var/run/macscope echo "[launch] Starting macscope-vhid relay" >> "$LOG" exec /usr/local/bin/macscope-vhid --verbose >> "$LOG" 2>&1
